column1:
After studying this chapter, you will be able to:
• Describe the major sections of the neurological exam
• Outline the benefits of rapidly assessing neurological function
• Relate anatomical structures of the nervous system to specific functions
• Diagram the connections of the nervous system to the musculature and integument involved in primary
sensorimotor responses
• Compareandcontrastthesomaticandvisceralreflexeswithrespecttohowtheyareassessedthroughthe
neurological exam
